name: Mystery Trackers 11: Train to Hellswich Collector's Edition
name_original: Mystery Trackers 11: Train to Hellswich Collector's Edition
description:
Mystery Trackers 11: Train to Hellswich Collector's Edition is a casual adventure game developed by Elephant Games. It came out on 28-07-2016. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Mystery Trackers 11: Train to Hellswich Collector's Edition is available on PC.
